entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
